xxl.core.io

Class RandomAccessFileInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • xxl.core.io.RandomAccessFileInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class RandomAccessFileInputStream
extends InputStream
    This class provides a mechanism to read data via an InputStream from a RandomAccessFile. The stream starts reading at the current position of the underlying file. A close of the stream does not close the file, so it is still open for subsequent processing.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected long markPos
      Position set by the mark-operation (initially 0).
      protected RandomAccessFile raf
      The internally used RandomAccessFile

      • available

        public int available()
              throws IOException
        Determines the number of bytes which can be read without blocking. Here, it is the number of bytes left after the current position in the file.
        Overrides:
        available in class InputStream
        Returns:
        available bytes
        Throws:
        IOException
